org.pepstock.charba.client.options

Class Title

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.JavaScriptObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.ChartContainer
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.options.Title

  • public final class Title
extends ChartContainer
    Configures the chart title which defines text to draw at the top of the chart.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

      • setPadding

        public void setPadding(int padding)
        Sets the padding to apply around title. Only top and bottom are implemented.
        Parameters:
        padding - Padding to apply around title. Only top and bottom are implemented.

      • getPadding

        public int getPadding()
        Returns the padding to apply around title. Only top and bottom are implemented.
        Returns:
